text: La Rosa de Guadalupe (English language: Guadalupe's Rose or The Rose of Guadalupe) is a Mexican anthology supernatural drama television series. It was created by Carlos Mercado Orduña and produced by Miguel Ángel Herros for Televisa. This series connects to the Catholic religion, specifically to the Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe. It premiered on February 5, 2008. As of 2017, the actress Helena Rojo is the presenter of each episode. Starting in May 2017, "La rosa de Guadalupe" began broadcasting episodes with more crude stories. These stories touch more explicit topics such as rape, incest, sexual harassment, murder, drug addiction, etc. On July 22, 2017, the 1000th episode "The bastard sister" was aired. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2008 television series debuts Category:Mexican telenovelas Category:2008 establishments in North America Category:2000s Mexican television series debuts Category:2010s Mexican television series
title: La rosa de Guadalupe
